intension: Create an eye-catching collage to promote a beauty store's sale on two different 9-shade eye shadow palettes with prices of $39/$35 and $32/$25. Use vibrant colors to showcase the makeup products.
globalcaption: The image features a collection of nine different colored makeup palettes, each with a unique shade of eyeshadow. The palettes are arranged in a visually appealing manner, with some placed closer to the front and others further back. The colors of the eyeshadow palettes vary from light to dark, creating a diverse range of options for makeup enthusiasts.
keywords: beauty, palette, cosmetics, makeup, eyeshadow, shadow, powder, sale, discount, collage, bright, colorful, neon, instagram, post, insta, ig, tb

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a collection of nine different colored squares, each with a distinct shade of green. The squares are arranged in a grid-like pattern, with some squares being larger and others smaller. The colors of the squares vary from light to dark, creating a visually appealing and diverse display

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a white background with four colored squares placed on it. The squares are arranged in a way that they are positioned at the corners of the image, with one square in the top left corner, another in the top right corner, one in the bottom left corner, and the last one in the bottom right corner. The colors of the squares are pink, green, blue, and yellow, creating a visually appealing and vibrant composition
